diagnosis.final_diagnosis: acute appendicitis, intraperitoneal hemorrhage, acute blood loss anemia, post op ileus, urinary retention
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with right lower quadrant pain, significant tenderness and guarding on examination, and abdominal radiographs showed multiple loops of dilated bowel. The clinical picture along with the need for surgery suggested acute appendicitis complicated by intraperitoneal hemorrhage and resultant acute blood loss anemia.
